provisions.description: Constitution of the PRC (中华人民共和国宪法) Article 1 — establishes the PRC as a socialist state under the people's democratic dictatorship; stable anchor provision unchanged since 2018 amendment
provisions.expected_snippet: 中华人民共和国是工人阶级领导的、以工农联盟为基础的人民民主专政的社会主义国家

provisions.description: Cybersecurity Law (网络安全法) Article 1 — purpose clause; adopted 2016-11-07, amended 2025-10-28, effective revision 2026-01-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 为了保障网络安全，维护网络空间主权和国家安全

provisions.description: Personal Information Protection Law (个人信息保护法) Article 1 — purpose clause; adopted 2021-08-20, effective 2021-11-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 为了保护个人信息权益，规范个人信息处理活动

provisions.description: Data Security Law (数据安全法) Article 1 — purpose clause; adopted 2021-06-10, effective 2021-09-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 为了规范数据处理活动，保障数据安全

provisions.description: Company Law (公司法) Article 1 — purpose clause; revised 2023-12-29, effective 2024-07-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 为了规范公司的组织和行为，保护公司

provisions.description: Civil Code (民法典) Book Three Contract Article 463 — scope clause establishing that Book Three regulates civil-law relations arising from contracts; adopted 2020-05-28, effective 2021-01-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 本编调整因合同产生的民事关系

provisions.description: Anti-Monopoly Law (反垄断法) Article 1 — purpose clause; revised 2022-06-24, effective 2022-08-01
provisions.expected_snippet: 为了预防和制止垄断行为，保护市场公平竞争
